extensionName.description: Please keep in mind that these strings had to be approved by the Google Brand Features Team. Be sure to make clear that this extension is *FOR* Google Calendar and not *BY* Google. Also, it was explicitly stated, that the phrase 'Google Calendar' should be localized just as it is on the localized versions of the Google Calendar UI.

extensionDescription.message: Allows bidirectional access to Google Calendar
extensionDescription.description: Please keep in mind that these strings had to be approved by the Google Brand Features Team. Be sure to make clear that this extension is *FOR* Google Calendar and not *BY* Google. Also, it was explicitly stated, that the phrase 'Google Calendar' should be localized just as it is on the localized versions of the Google Calendar UI.

gdata-provider.label.description: Please keep in mind that these strings had to be approved by the Google Brand Features Team. Be sure to make clear that this extension is *FOR* Google Calendar and not *BY* Google. Also, it was explicitly stated, that the phrase 'Google Calendar' should be localized just as it is on the localized versions of the Google Calendar UI.

gdata.migration.description.message: The Provider for Google Calendar has detected that you have existing calendars that are only capable of accessing Google Calendar in read-only mode. If you would like to upgrade any of these calendars, please select them below

gdata.wizard.session.description.message: Please pick an existing session or enter your email address to create a new session. You only need one session per account.

gdata.wizard.calendars.description.message: Please select the calendars and task lists you would like to subscribe to.

gdata.wizard.nextstep.description.message: Please advance to the next step to set up your calendars.

busyTitle.description: Events with only free/busy access don't have a title, they will use this title instead. The calendar name is used as a parameter, since its often named after the person whose calendar you are viewing.

calendar_name.example: The name of the calendar, e.g. 'Home'

quotaExceeded.message: The quota for $session_id$ has been exceeded, please try again later.
quotaExceeded.description: This is shown when the request quota has been exceeded.

session_id.example: The session id (what the user enters as an email in the new calendar dialog)

providerOutdated.message: This version of the provider has expired, please update to the latest version.

reminderOutOfRange.message: Google Calendar only allows reminders up to 4 weeks before the event starts.

calendar_name.example: The name of the calendar, e.g. 'Home'

num_events_synced.example: The number of events already synced

calendar_name.example: The name of the calendar, e.g. 'Home'

num_tasks_synced.example: The number of tasks already synced

calendar_name.example: The name of the calendar, e.g. 'Home'

requestWindowDescription.message: The Provider for Google Calendar would like to access your account $session_id$ to retrieve events and tasks. Credentials and calendaring data is only transfered between your computer and Google, no third party sites are involved.

session_id.example: The session id (what the user enters as an email in the new calendar dialog)
The session id (what the user enters as an email in the new calendar dialog)
